item.description:
Buon Giorno Amici -

Here's a last minute add to our calendar. It is sure to be a wonderful afternoon! Sergio Franchi, Italian singer lost his battle to cancer back in 1990 but his music lives on. Tickets can be purchased the day of the event as well.

The following information is posted on www.sergiofranchi.com by his loving wife Eva.

Dear friends and loyal supporters...Great news, WE ARE BACK!
Thank you for your patience and understanding.
IT’S BEEN WAY TOO LONG, IT'S TIME TO HAVE FUN TOGETHER AGAIN

The 2010 Sergio Franchi concert will take place on:
Saturday August 7th, 2010.
Grounds open at noon
Concert begins promptly at 3 p.m.
Concert will end at 5:45 p.m.
Please bring a picnic lunch, as food sales will be limited.

For tickets, please make your donation of $35 per
person out to
"Sergio Franchi Music Foundation"
and mail the check to :
2010 Ticket Sales
91 Sergio Franchi Dr
Stonington, CT 06378
No other method of pre-purchase is available.
Tickets will be sold at the door the day of the concert.
For further information, call 860-535-9429
Grounds open at noon
Concert begins promptly at 3 p.m.
Concert will end at 5:45 p.m.
Please bring a picnic lunch, as food sales will be limited.
Hope to see you all, and once again, we will "...Let the
Music Play" in memory of our darling Sergio.
Start getting ready! I promise you a star studded event
and the greatest show of our 15 years.
I missed you all so much, and can’t wait to see you all.
Warmest regards, much love
… Eva.
p.s. My deepest apologies for the past two years. I have so
much to share with you!
item.name: 2010 Sergio Franchi Concert
